job description:
Job ID: 36578

***Not able to use 3rd Party Agencies***

Data Engineer

Our client is seeking a Data Engineer to join their team in Beaverton, OR. We are looking for a senior engineer with cloud infrastructure experience to join our Big Data Platform Operations team. We provide cloud infrastructure to over 500 internal engineering and technical business users (Data Scientists and Analysts).

Data Engineer Responsibilities

Support Data scientist with Cloud based captivations

Support data finders within the data movement

Serve as a leader in supporting and operating key aspects of our infrastructure services.

Improve our infrastructure by developing and improving automation tools.

Provide advanced engineering support services to end users:

Gather technical details.

Provide status updates to users and stakeholders.

Track all details in the issue tracking system (JIRA).

Provide issue review and triage problems for new service/support requests.

Agile environment – Will interact with stake holders

Data Engineer Qualifications

MS/BS in Computer Science or related field.

2-3 years of AWS and Python

Hadoop: Experience with Hadoop (Hive, Spark, Sqoop)

ETL: Job scheduler experience like Oozie or Airflow. Nice to have Airflow experience.

Security: Experience implementing role-based security, including AD integration, security policies, and auditing in a Linux/Hadoop/AWS environment.

ELK stack: Experience with setting up ELK stack for Analytics.

Research and deploy new tools and frameworks to build a sustainable big data platform.

Benefits

Benefits are available to eligible VanderHouwen contractors and include coverage for medical, dental, vision, life insurance, short and long term disability, and matching 401k.

About VanderHouwen

VanderHouwen is an award-winning, Women-Owned, WBENC certified professional staffing firm. Founded in 1987, VanderHouwen has been successfully placing experienced professionals throughout the Pacific Northwest and nationwide. Our recruitment teams are highly specialized in either Technology and IT, Engineering, or Accounting and Finance career markets. Our recruiters value building meaningful, professional relationships with each candidate as well as developing honed knowledge of companies' staffing needs and workplaces. Partner with us to land your next exciting career.
